framework.name: Comparison 1
framework.summary: This type of essay compares and contrasts two things, ideas, etc. This framework emphasizes the differences between the two things.

framework.name: Comparison 2
framework.summary: This type of essay compares and contrasts two things, ideas, etc. This framework emphasizes the similarities between the two things.

framework.name: Comparison 3
framework.summary: This type of essay compares and contrasts two things, ideas, etc. This framework describes the features of X and Y, and then compares them.

framework.name: Comparison 4
framework.summary: This type of essay compares and contrasts two things, ideas, etc. This framework is suitable for longer comparison and contrast essays.

framework.name: Argument 1
framework.summary: This type of essay requires you to present a reasoned argument on a particular issue. This framework presents all the arguments on one side first, followed by the arguments on the other side.

framework.name: Argument 2
framework.summary: This type of essay requires you to present a reasoned argument on a particular issue. This framework presents an alternating series of arguments and counterarguments.

framework.name: Presentation
framework.summary: This framework suggests a way of structuring an oral presentation.

framework.name: Reporting on data: graphs
framework.summary: This framework shows how to write about the data shown in a graph.

framework.name: Reporting on data: pie charts
framework.summary: This framework shows how to write about the data shown in a pie chart.

framework.name: Short report
framework.summary: A report describes a study, an investigation or a project. This framework shows a typical structure for short reports.

framework.name: Long report
framework.summary: A report describes a study, an investigation or a project. This framework shows a typical structure for long reports, and how to write an executive summary.

framework.name: Review
framework.summary: This framework shows a typical structure for a review of a book or film/movie.

framework.name: Letter of enquiry
framework.summary: This framework shows how to present a formal letter asking for information.

framework.name: Letter of complaint
framework.summary: This framework shows how to present a formal letter of complaint.

framework.name: Covering/Cover Letter
framework.summary: This framework shows a typical structure for a covering/cover letter to accompany a CV/ résumé.

framework.name: New graduate CV
framework.summary: This framework shows a way of presenting a British-style CV if you are a new graduate.

framework.name: American-style résumé
framework.summary: This framework shows a way of presenting an American-style résumé.

framework.name: Experienced candidate CV
framework.summary: This framework shows a way of presenting a British-style CV if you are an experienced candidate.
